summary: This Is A Mod I Made When Messing About With The Creation Kit.
descriptionHtml:
As You Could Tell By The Title This Mod Adds A New Follower To Skyrim, The Daedric Warrior.
He Can Be Found In The Bannered Mare, In Whiterun And Can Be Allied.

He\'s An Overhauled Orc Made Into A Daedric Warrior Wearing Full Daedric Armour,Equiped With Many Daedric Weapons And 999 Daedra Hearts.

This Is My First Mod And Any Support Would Be Much Welcome. :)

My Youtube Channel - http://www.youtube.com/user/G1fan1998
author: G1fan1998
